sentences.sContent: We regaled ourselves on caviar and champagne.
sentences.sContent_eng: We regaled ourselves on caviar and champagne.
sentences.sCn: 我们尽情地享用鱼子酱和香槟酒。

sentences.sContent: Waiter: Sir, what would you like to drink, wine or champagne?
sentences.sContent_eng: Waiter: Sir, what would you like to drink, wine or champagne?
sentences.sCn: 服务员：先生，您想喝点什么？葡萄酒还是香槟酒？

sentences.sContent: French perfume, champagne, and bridges in Paris… want to know more? Then next time we will return to Paris, and you will learn more about her.
sentences.sContent_eng: French perfume, champagne, and bridges in Paris… want to know more? Then next time we will return to Paris, and you will learn more about her.
sentences.sCn: 还有法国的香水、香槟酒、巴黎的桥……。你想知道的更多吗？下次我们会谈到巴黎，您可以深入地了解她。

sentences.sContent: ...Do you think the champagne market will recover in the future...
...the economic problems have certainly been one reason for the decrease in champagne sales...
...Well the biggest change has been the decrease in sales since the great boom years of the 1980s when champagne production and sales reached record levels...
...And then there was another problem for champagne in the early 90s...
...Well the record was in 1989 when 249 million bottles of champagne was sold...
...What does the man say about champagne in the 1980s...
...what changes have you seen in the champagne market in the last ten to fifteen years...
...Why did sparkling wines become more popular than champagne in the early 90s...
...What does the man think of the champagne market in the future...

phrases.pCn: 凹底很深的酒瓶；香槟酒瓶

trans.tranOther: a French white wine with a lot of  bubble s  , drunk on special occasions
